infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Trail Blazer uses the camera to capture geo-tagged photos during your runs.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Trail Blazer saves photos you capture during your runs.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Trail Blazer accesses your photo library to attach photos to your runs.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Trail Blazer uses your location to track distance and pace during runs.
